description:
Manaka’s competitive spirit ignites when she discovers ice hockey! Even though she’s a rookie, she’s got her sights set on Nikko City’s hockey team, where girls aim for the top as they compete in this full-contact sport. After finally convincing her childhood friends and her sister to play, they join a team of girls ready to go for the goal!

(Source: Funimation)

title.native: プラオレ！PRIDE OF ORANGE プレシーズン〜幣舞橋〜

node.description:
**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/anzai_takebumi)**

Takefumi Anzai is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)

• [Kuniyuki Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/154774/Kuniyuki-Takahashi)
• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroXtana)

Hiroyuki Tanaka is a producer. Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/117045/) with the same name.

__Place of Birth:__ Okayama Prefecture
__Height:__ 154 cm
__Hobbies:__ DIY, walking, collecting miscellaneous goods
__Skills:__ eating grilled fish beautifully

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hng_satomi)

__Nickname:__ Yoppii (よっぴー)

[Profile (81produce)](https://www.81produce.co.jp/dcms_plusdb/index.php/item?cell003=%E3%81%82%E8%A1%8C&cell029=%E5%A5%B3%E6%80%A7&keyword=&cell028=&cell004=&name=%E9%9D%92%E5%B1%B1%E3%80%80%E5%90%89%E8%83%BD&id=146&label=1) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yopipi555) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yopipinsta555/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/2oWuPhnuBys0IELQq85Ww2) | [Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/artist/aoyama-yoshino/1122368744) | [Deezer](https://deezer.page.link/5mii1BmZpaNTCA1KA) | [Youtube Music](https://music.youtube.com/channel/UCmFz2zC7wBI00bcyBGiwE-g)

**Non-anime voice roles:** 
- Jinhsi - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Noire - Granblue Fantasy
